Package com.att.research.xacml.api.pap Description

The PAP interface's defined here are an attempt at defining an API for PAP implementations. There is nothing in the XACML 3.0 specification for doing so. Thus, this API is open to suggestions and is simply optional to utilize.
Author:
pameladragosh
